meanings.definition: An uncomfortable sensation on the skin causing a desire to scratch.
meanings.sent1: The itching on my arm was so annoying that I couldn't focus on my homework.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist scratching the itching on her back.
meanings.sent3: The itching on my nose made me look like a bunny twitching its nose.
meanings.sent4: The itching of curiosity drove her to explore the mysterious cave.
meanings.sent5: The itching sensation felt like tiny ants crawling under my skin.

meanings.definition: A strong desire or impulse to do something.
meanings.sent1: His itching to travel the world led him to save up money for a backpacking trip.
meanings.sent2: The itching to learn a new language motivated her to enroll in a language course.
meanings.sent3: The itching to dance overwhelmed him, and he started tapping his feet to the music.
meanings.sent4: Her itching for adventure was like a fire burning inside her, urging her to explore new places.
meanings.sent5: The itching to succeed in his career pushed him to work hard and never give up.
